title: Misunderstanding
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>1, 2, 3, 4--<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>....Hanayo-chan, let’s stop here for a bit. Also, can you sit around there and wait?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Eh? O-, okay....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>(W-, what should I do.... I wonder if it’s because I made a mistake earlier even though we’re in a joint practice.... Maybe Kanan-san is mad at me....)<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Thanks for waiting~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>K-, Kanan-san, I’m sorry! Even though we had an opportunity for a joint practice, I couldn’t do the steps well.... I’ll do my best to not make mistakes next time, so, please....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Eh? I thought you did the steps pretty well earlier, though, Hanayo-chan? Your footwork is also much smoother than the last time I saw it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>R-, really? Then, why did we stop midway....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Aaah, you’re worried about that? I thought it’s about time we rehydrate ourselves for practicing in this heat. I was buying some sports drinks. I’m sorry for the misunderstanding.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>So that’s what it was, thank goodness....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
